name: The Tamperer featuring Maya
description: '''The Tamperer featuring Maya''' is an Italian [[dance music]] [[musical ensemble|group]] consisting of Italian [[record producer]]s [[Fargetta|Mario Fargetta]] and [[Alex Farolfi]]. The group initially featured American [[singing|singer]] Maya Days. Later, Giuliano Saglia and GianLuca Mensi would join the project. They achieved European success in 1998 with "[[Feel It (The Tamperer featuring Maya song)|Feel It]]", which reached number-one in both the United Kingdom and Ireland. The Tamperer remains active and since 2024 has been performing with singer Danielle Barnett, former lead vocalist of 1990s dance group [[Urban Cookie Collective]].
